column4: hi, could someone help me get my sound working again? I'm using Edgy
you've opened alsa mixer and double checked? MM = muted, make sure all channels are unmute
anyone know why my video lags when I try to go full screen? I've installed my drivers as far as i know (beryl is running) dma=on if that helps at all, I never had this problem in windows.
how do I make sure they are all un-muted? a command I can do?
out of ideas then, hehe. Has it ever worked?
and it just stopped? hmm, no idea there. That happened to me but mine was accidently muted
hmm I did accidentally leave some changed in the gdm conf file that I had to remove cause it couldn't start
I also removed some old python files
all that is beyond my knowledge
I guess I'll ask on the forums
try that, i think i might do the same with my video problem
